overview:
Stephen Pao has more than 20 years of experience in high growth technology companies based in both Seattle and the Bay Area.

Currently, Steve is responsible for strategic product direction, definition and program management for all Barracuda Networks products.

Prior to joining Barracuda Networks, Steve led program management and engineering efforts at All Star Directories, a leading Internet lead generation provider in Washington.

Before All Star, Steve held vice president of marketing positions at AskMe Corporation, a leading enterprise knowledge management software provider, and at Latitude Communications (acquired by Cisco Systems), a leading voice and Web conferencing provider. Steve also held product management positions at Visioneer (acquired by Nuance), where he launched the award-winning PaperPort product and at Oracle Corporation where he led product management for Oracle’s line of decision support products.

Steve earned his bachelor’s and master’s degrees in electrical engineering from Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
